wikitext.*:
'''oiale''' is a [[Quenya]] adverb meaning "forever, eternally, in eternity,<ref>{{PE|Eldarin}}, p. 69</ref> everlastingly".<ref>{{RGEO|Namarie}}, line 14</ref> It can also be used as a noun for "everlasting [?age]"<ref>{{HM|LR}}, [[The Etymologies]]</ref>
==Etymology==
The word could have be the [[Sundocarmë|Root]] [[OY]] or a stem like ''[[oio]]'' "an endless period", plus the ending ''[[-lë]]''.
